skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: AdamAugustinsky

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only text instructions for frontend design guidance. No executable code, no network calls, no filesystem access, no command execution. Completely safe for users. Static findings are false positives: URL field is metadata, 'hidden file access' is a misinterpretation, and 'weak cryptographic algorithm' flags were triggered by SHA256 hashes and font name references.

content.value_statement: Building production-grade web interfaces often results in generic, forgettable designs. This skill helps create memorable, creative frontend designs with bold aesthetics, thoughtful typography, and polished details that stand out from generic patterns.
actual_capabilities: Creates production-grade HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components
Designs interfaces with bold, distinctive aesthetics and creative direction
Implements smooth animations and micro-interactions using CSS and Motion library
Applies thoughtful typography, color systems, and spatial composition
Builds responsive layouts with unexpected, memorable visual elements
Avoids generic AI aesthetics by committing to unique design directions
limitations: Does not execute code or verify it works in live environments
Does not access external design resources or assets
Cannot interact with design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Output quality depends on clarity of user requirements provided

use_cases.title: Build striking components
use_cases.description: Create memorable UI components with bold aesthetics for production web applications

use_cases.title: Prototype creative interfaces
use_cases.description: Rapidly prototype distinctive page layouts and interface concepts with polished visuals

use_cases.title: Add visual polish
use_cases.description: Transform basic functional interfaces into visually compelling, production-ready designs

prompt_templates.title: Basic component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a [component type] for a [purpose]. The audience is [describe users]. Make it visually distinctive with a bold aesthetic direction.

prompt_templates.title: Complete page
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a complete [page type] page. The goal is [user goal]. Choose a striking aesthetic and implement production-ready HTML, CSS, and JS.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive feature
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a [feature] with smooth animations and micro-interactions. Use CSS animations and Motion library. Focus on high-impact visual moments.

prompt_templates.title: Design system
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a cohesive set of [components] with consistent typography, color system, and spatial rhythm. The aesthetic should be [descriptor].

output_examples.input: Build a login form for a luxury e-commerce brand
output: A sleek, high-contrast login form with refined typography and subtle animations
Dark background with gold accents and minimalist input fields
Smooth focus transitions and a distinctive submit button hover effect
Production-ready HTML, CSS with CSS variables for theming

output_examples.input: Create a landing page for a sustainable coffee startup
output: Earthy color palette with warm browns and cream tones
Organic, flowing layout with asymmetrical grid elements
Custom geometric patterns inspired by coffee bean shapes
Staggered reveal animations on scroll for visual interest

output_examples.input: Design a mobile-first navigation component for a music app
output: Dark mode interface with vibrant accent colors
Gestural animations that feel musical and fluid
Compact, accessible touch targets optimized for mobile

best_practices: Choose a clear aesthetic direction before coding and commit to it fully throughout the design
Use distinctive font pairings and CSS variables for cohesive, intentional visual systems
Focus animation effort on high-impact moments rather than scattering micro-interactions
Design for the specific context and audience rather than defaulting to generic patterns
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto that lack character and visual interest
Applying purple gradients on white backgrounds or other cliched AI-generated aesthetics
Creating predictable, symmetrical layouts without creative tension or visual interest
Generating the same design across multiple requests without variation or creative exploration

faq.question: Which frontend frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue, and similar modern frontend technologies.

faq.question: Can this skill create complex animations and effects?
faq.answer: Yes. It implements CSS animations, micro-interactions, and can use Motion library for React when appropriate.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my codebase?
faq.answer: The skill generates code that you copy and paste into your project. It produces production-ready code.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill that only provides design guidance. It does not access files or network.

faq.question: The output is not working in my project. What should I check?
faq.answer: Verify you copied all code correctly, check for missing dependencies, and ensure your project supports the CSS features used.

faq.question: How is this different from generic code generation?
faq.answer: This skill intentionally avoids generic AI aesthetics. It commits to bold, distinctive design directions with creative choices.
